content:
Luxembourg has become another country to join the artillery coalition led by France and Germany.

About thisSaidLuxembourg Defense Minister Yuriko Baches at the 20th meeting of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine.

“In Ramstay, the Defense Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine has announced that Luxembourg: joins an artillery coalition led by France and Germany. Purchases drones for Ukraine in cooperation with Belgium and the Netherlands. It continues to support Ukraine, delivering the necessary equipment, ”the message reads.

As ArmyInform reported, in January 2024 in ParisShe started workArtillery Coalition for Strengthening the Ukrainian Army. More than 20 countries have joined it.

Canadawill passArmed Forces of Ukraine night vision devices worth $7.5 million.
title: Another country joined the artillery coalition for Ukraine
description: This was stated by Luxembourg Defense Minister Yuriko Bakz at the 20th meeting ...
author: Army Inform
